DPM_TEAM04.odometry

Class Odometer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • DPM_TEAM04.odometry.Odometer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Odometer
extends java.lang.Thread
    A classic odometer. Can output position X, Y and the heading position.
    Author:
    Tristan Toupin, Alexis GJ & KareemHalabi
